directions: Stir the corn, orange bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, crushed red pepper, honey, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Chill until ready to serve.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste
1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, or to taste
salt and black pepper to taste
title: Easy Corn Salsa
